abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers pitcher Jordan Zimmermann receives warm welcome from fans in team's spring training game against Washington Nationals, Zimmerman's former team; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Zimmermann, who pitched for Washington for seven seasons before signing with Detroit over the winter, saw many friendly faces in his spring debut.

headline.main: Jordan Zimmermann and Nationals Are Reunited in Good Spirits
headline.print_headline: Zimmermann and Nationals Are Reunited in Good Spirits

snippet: Jordan Zimmermann, who pitched for Washington for seven seasons before signing with Detroit over the winter, saw many friendly faces in his spring debut.
